title: Integration with AWS CloudFormation and OpenStack Heat
subtitle: How to install and configure Amazon CloudFormation and OpenStack Heat in a Red Hat CloudForms environment

abstract.para: This guide provides instructions on the implementation of Amazon CloudFormation and OpenStack Heat in Red Hat CloudForms, and discusses the various areas of integration. Information and procedures in this book are relevant to CloudForms Management Engine administrators.

If you have a suggestion for improving this guide or have found an error, please submit a Bugzilla report at http://bugzilla.redhat.com against Red Hat CloudForms Management Engine for the Documentation component. Please provide specific details, such as the section number, guide name, and CloudForms version so we can easily locate the content.
